localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: HeadScroll is a product that helps musicians play instruments. It allows them to navigate their music sheets, chords, or tabs by simply tilting their head. The product is in beta, but we're looking forward to hear your early feedback! 😊
blogPost.body: HeadScroll is a product that helps musicians play instruments. It allows them to navigate their music sheets, chords, or tabs by simply tilting their head. The product is in beta, but we're looking forward to hear your early feedback! 😊
blogPost.title: HeadScroll - Scroll music tabs with your head
blogPost.author: Juan Herrera

localize.description: HeadScrollは、ミュージシャンの楽器演奏をサポートする製品です。頭を傾けるだけで、譜面やコード、タブなどを操作することができます。この製品はまだベータ版ですが、皆様からのフィードバックをお待ちしています！😊。
localize.tagline: 頭で音楽タブをスクロール

localize.description: HeadScroll是一个帮助音乐家演奏乐器的产品。它允许他们通过简单地倾斜头部来浏览他们的乐谱、和弦或标签。该产品处于测试阶段，但我们期待着听到您的早期反馈！😊
localize.tagline: 用你的头滚动音乐标签

localize.description: HeadScroll是一個幫助音樂家演奏樂器的產品。它允許他們通過簡單地傾斜頭部來瀏覽他們的樂譜、和絃或標籤。該產品處於測試階段，但我們期待着聽到您的早期反饋！😊
localize.tagline: 用你的頭滾動音樂標籤

previous.title: If you make coffee at home for the next 100 years, you might be able to afford 1 Bitcoin. https://t.co/xtvOclIPt7

localize.full_text: 今後100年間、自宅でコーヒーを作っていれば、1ビットコインが買えるかもしれません。https://t.co/xtvOclIPt7
如果你在未来100年里在家里做咖啡，你也许能买得起1比特币。https://t.co/xtvOclIPt7
如果你在未來100年裏在家裏做咖啡，你也許能買得起1比特幣。https://t.co/xtvOclIPt7
